summary: This document is an email correspondence from Amanda Kirby to an unspecified recipient, discussing securities and financial transactions involving Southern Financial and Deutsche Bank. It includes attachments related to financial positions and account transfers.

persons.name: Amanda Kirby
persons.context: Amanda Kirby is identified as an associate at Deutsche Bank Trust Company and is the sender of the email discussing securities.

persons.name: Harry Bober
persons.context: Harry Bober is mentioned as the recipient of the forwarded email, discussing securities and account transfers.

connections.description: Amanda Kirby forwards an email from Harry Bober regarding securities and financial transactions.

keyFacts: The email discusses the transfer of securities from Southern Financial to Deutsche Bank.
Amanda Kirby is an associate at Deutsche Bank Trust Company.
Harry Bober is involved in the discussion of securities but his role is not specified.
